I think something’s really wrong, and I’m worried because I’ve had diabetes for years and my immune system isn’t as strong as it used to be.

I woke up feeling really hot and shivery, and I’ve been throwing up everything I eat or drink, even water. I’m feeling so weak, and I just don’t know what’s happening, but I’m really scared.
